document_data.caption: ''A depiction of a velociraptor from [[Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation]].''
document_data.name: Velociraptor
document_data.othernames: Raptor, Little Thunder{{Cite organized play/LJ/Monkey City|2}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Velociraptors''', simply '''raptors''',, were small aggressive [[dinosaur]]s who hunted in packs.
document_data.Description: Velociraptors were covered in feathers and were similar in size to large [[turkey]]s. They were small cousins of the larger [[deinonychus]].
document_data.Combat: These predators usually used pack hunting tactics that allowed them to bring down much larger prey. Their main weapons were their sharp claws and their strong bites.

Ecology.Habitats:
Velociraptors were commonly found in the jungles and beaches of [[Chult]].

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], some could be found in the [[Forbidden Plateau (divine realm)|Forbidden Plateau]].
Ecology.Usage:
[[File:Velociraptor.png|thumb|''A Chultan velociraptor.'']]
Velociraptor [[leather]] was a quality crafting material, used in creation of armor and reinforcing weapons. It was often used by [[Chultan (ethnicity)|Chultan]] and [[Tabaxi (tribe)|Tabaxi]] warriors. Velociraptor fangs could be used to create sharp and deadly [[dagger|shivs]]
